content:
Dear Sir/Madam,
I working on a project and need a dataset of HL v2 messages of any hospital information systems. I would be so thankful if anyone can share with me. If anyone has or know any dataset (HL7 v2 messages), then please share with me( Email :mohd.ayazkn@gmail.com).
Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
Thanks,
Ayaz,
Email :mohd.ayazkn@gmail.com
